attributes.action: Overstepping the mark dumped Britain into Oblivion.
attributes.additional_details:
Dare Britain overstep the mark ever again?
Everyone overstepped the mark & they are suffering.
Overstepping the mark reaped Britain many curses.
Good cop stuck with bad cop.
Good doc stuck with bad doc.
Good nurse stuck with bad nurse.
Recognise your curses Britain.
Your curses are many Britain.
